posts.post_content:
Going to slowly work toward this set, PSA 4 T206 HOF
So far I have the following:

Ty Cobb red portrait
Miller Huggins hand at mouth
Addie Joss pitching
Rube MArquard hands at thighs
Cy Young glove shows

I am looking to see what is out there. Please pm me with what you have and your price.  emphasis on centering and image quality/color on front
NOT looking for rare backs, etc.  Going for the basic set.  (without Plank and Wagner of course)
Thanks for looking,
Eric
